Package core

Class Connect4ComputerPlayer

java.lang.Object
core.Connect4ComputerPlayer
public class Connect4ComputerPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
Version:
1.0 This class controls the logic for a computer controlled player to play connect 4.
Author:
Ryan Munin

  • Constructor Summary

    Connect4ComputerPlayer()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void takeTurn​(Connect4 myGame, char player)
    This is the logic for a computer player to place their pieces.

  • Constructor Details

    • Connect4ComputerPlayer

      public Connect4ComputerPlayer()

  • Method Details

    • takeTurn

      public static void takeTurn​(Connect4 myGame, char player)
      This is the logic for a computer player to place their pieces. It places in the leftmost column until that column is full, then moves on to the next column.
      Parameters:
      myGame - is a connect4 game object.
      player - is a character representing which player the computer is playing as. X or O.
